name: James Hackney: Living with Cerebral Palsy and how the Adult Industry has positively benefited his sex life? | The Adults Corner
summary:
In this week's episode we talk about the stigma and stereotypes surrounding Cerebral Palsy, what it's like dealing with daily obstacles and how the Adult Industry has positively benefited James Hackney and his sexual needs. We cover topics such as: James opens up about his accident as a child and how it has affected him growing up emotionally and physicallyJames organised a charity walk in 2016 in Queensland to speak out against bullyingHow James lost his virginity at a brothel and what his first experience was likeHow to feel safe and communicate when hiring a professional
Be sure to check out our video snippets on our social media @theadultscorner
